text:
Hey Sam:
1. Yes the current version of the theme will remain in the marketplace while the pending changes are in the queue
2. There aren't any specific turnaround times for reviews at the moment (typically most reviews are handled in under 14 days but this can vary depending on the queue and the complexity of assets being submitted e.g. hackathon).

Hey Marketplace-Team,

we just received an E-Mail with Subject *"Edits required: HubSpot Marketplace theme submission"  _* we implemented these changes and want to resubmit the Listing by clicking on "Editing Draft"...

But at the end of the process we can not submit for approval because the button is "disabled" with the notice "This theme is being validated. Please refresh the page to check in again."

can you please check this for our account with the number *8670649*

Thanks

Hans
<@U22PWJ41G> the mail was sent from your account :slightly_smiling_face: - nice to meet you :stuck_out_tongue:
Hi Hans, can you try refreshing the page and seeing if the validation has completed?
oh yes - i do it a lot of times but nothing happens :slightly_smiling_face:

maybe another small question:

We need to change our Company Name in Provider Info... But an errror says

"Sorry, but there was a problem updating your contact info. Please try again."
it's only an error for the company name - all other fields are no problem
Hi Hans, I can take care of that for you. Do you mind sending me a DM with the name that youâ€™d like to update to?
Now the theme listing says "Approval pending" - great to see :slightly_smiling_face:
